column5: Hello  So the threads stripped on my Abu 7001 drive shaft a while back  I ordered what I thought was the replacement part... it's like 1-2mm shorter than it should be so it doesn't work properly  I got my schematics out and got the right part number but can't find one online anywhere  I'm looking for part #1344502 "main gear bush riveted"  Can anyone help me out here?  Thanks
Have you tried Rocky's in orillia?  I just did a quick google for abu parts and their name came up. 705-325-3528, 3 Royce ave # 1 & 2, Orillia, L3V 5H8 is where they are now.  Michael
Try Mike's reel repair for parts
